Articles.Content:
So I've finally come around to make this guy. Its pretty straight forward to flying him. He's stable and maneuverable. He has a weird natural tendency to pull up, but this doesn't affect his performance and I have yet to find a way to lose control with this guy. I think it's a pretty smooth and good design.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Looks great! I like how you made the horizontal stabilizers, nice use of making the shape. It's a very clean, crisp looking design, well done.

Looks awesome! I'd attempt to make a F-22 but I am horrible at doing the wing connectors to make it look clean. :/

Edited December 16, 2014 by _Pylon
I wanted to make an F-22 but I couldn't do the wings because of the change between the delta wing in 0.24.4 and 0.25 D:

Looks great! I like how you made the horizontal stabilizers, nice use of making the shape. It's a very clean, crisp looking design, well done.

Thanks. Although I spent less time on this sucker than I expected

Looks awesome! I'd attempt to make a F-22 but I am horrible at doing the wing connectors to make it look clean. :/
I wanted to make an F-22 but I couldn't do the wings because of the change between the delta wing in 0.24.4 and 0.25 D:

Its not that complicated. Just try to refrain from angle snap and try to hide the black edges between the wings
Lookin swell. I am a big fan of f-22's yet I can never make them

Lookin swell. I am a big fan of f-22's yet I can never make them

Why not? Can I help in a way? I always like to help people. The 0.90 beta update has made things a bit more convenient (although this craft wasn't made with the new update).
